channel.title: Food on Casual Inference
channel.description: Recent content in Food on Casual Inference

item.title: #TidyTuesday: Ramen ratings
item.description: #TidyTuesday is a weekly data project for R users to practice data wrangling and visualization skills. Users work on a new dataset released each Tuesday, and then share their work. This week’s edition (Tidy Tuesday 23) contains ratings of ramen from The Ramen Rater. For health reasons, I’m currently unable to eat most ingredients found in this delicacy, so this analysis is the closest I’ll come to ramen for now.
